## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the file was successfully opened or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it was not.

## Discussion

Sent directly by `theApplication` to the delegate. The method should open the file `filename`, returning [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the file is successfully opened, and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise. If the user started up the application by double-clicking a file, the delegate receives the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplicationDelegate/application(_:openFile:)] message before receiving [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplicationDelegate/applicationDidFinishLaunching(_:)]. # application(_:openFile:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the app opens the specified file.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func application(_ sender: NSApplication, openFile filename: String) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The application object associated with the delegate.
- **filename**: The name of the file to open.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the file was successfully opened or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it was not.

## Discussion

Sent directly by `theApplication` to the delegate. The method should open the file `filename`, returning [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the file is successfully opened, and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise. If the user started up the application by double-clicking a file, the delegate receives the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplicationDelegate/application(_:openFile:)] message before receiving [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplicationDelegate/applicationDidFinishLaunching(_:)]. ([doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplicationDelegate/applicationWillFinishLaunching(_:)] is sent before [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplicationDelegate/application(_:openFile:)].)

## Opening Files

- **application(_:open:)**: Tells the delegate to open the resource at the specified URL.
- **application(_:openFileWithoutUI:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the app opens the specified file without showing its user interface.
- **application(_:openTempFile:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the app opens the specified temporary file.
- **application(_:openFiles:)**: Tells the delegate to open the specified files.
- **applicationShouldOpenUntitledFile(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the app can open an untitled file.
- **applicationOpenUntitledFile(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the app opens an untitled file.
